text:
The story of Aquaman started when Queen Atlanta 
of the underwater kingdom of Atlantis was rescued

by human Thomas Curry during a storm.
They fall in love and have a half-human,
half-atlantean son named Arthur.

However after being attacked by  soldiers sent by King Orvax,
 Atlanta is forced to go back to the ocean to protect her family.

In this lesson we will watch and 
learn with two scenes from this movie.

If you enjoy learning with movies, TV series, 
songs, documentaries, interviews and so much more

this is the right place for you!
We are here to teach you how to

understand English without getting lost, without 
missing the jokes and without subtitles. Just like

Gloria from Panama who improved her speaking and 
listening skills so much with our channel that

she aced a job interview and got the job.
So to join our community of over 4 million

learners. Just click on the Subscribe button 
and Bell down below to keep learning with us.

You can say wasted, hammered, tanked 
and so many others to describe someone

who has drunk too much alcohol.
If you want to learn more words

we use in real life situations then you have 
to check out our Fluent with Friends Course.

And did you know that you can try it right 
now for FREE with our 3-Part Masterclass?

Just click up here or the link down 
below to learn more and sign up.

So now you're going to watch the scenes again 
without subtitles and answer some quiz questions,

but don't forget that you can continue learning 
with us every day by following us on Instagram:

@reallife.english
You can also join me

there live every Wednesday at 3:00 PM CET for 
an exclusive lesson. I hope to see you there!
